001package fr.aumgn.dac2.utils;
002
003import org.bukkit.Location;
004import org.bukkit.block.Block;
005import org.bukkit.block.BlockFace;
006
007import fr.aumgn.bukkitutils.geom.Vector;
008import fr.aumgn.bukkitutils.geom.Vector2D;
009
010public final class DACUtil {
011
012    public static final int TICKS_PER_SECONDS = 20;
013    public static final int PLAYER_MAX_HEALTH = 20;
014    public static final int SIGN_MAX_CHAR = 16;
015    public static final int SIGN_LINES = 4;
016
017    private static final double BLOCK_LIMIT_LEFT = 0.3;
018    private static final double BLOCK_LIMIT_RIGHT = 0.7;
019
020    private static final int SIGN_HORIZONTAL_FACES = 16;
021    private static final double SIGN_FACES_ANGLE = Math.PI / SIGN_HORIZONTAL_FACES; 
022    private static final double MOD_0_TO_1 = Math.cos(7 * SIGN_FACES_ANGLE);
023    private static final double MOD_1_TO_2 = Math.cos(3 * SIGN_FACES_ANGLE);
024    private static final double MOD_2_TO_1 = Math.cos(SIGN_FACES_ANGLE);
025
026    private static int getBlockFaceModValue(double i) {
027        if (i < -1 || i > 1) {
028            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Value must be between -1 and 1");
029        }
030        else if (i < -MOD_2_TO_1)  { return -1; }
031        else if (i < -MOD_1_TO_2)  { return -2; }
032        else if (i < -MOD_0_TO_1)  { return -1; }
033        else if (i >  MOD_2_TO_1)  { return  1; }
034        else if (i >  MOD_1_TO_2)  { return  2; }
035        else if (i >  MOD_0_TO_1)  { return  1; }
036        else                       { return  0; }
037    }
038
039    public static BlockFace getHorizontalFaceFor(Vector2D vec) {
040        try {
041            Vector2D dir = vec.normalize();
042            int modX = getBlockFaceModValue(dir.getX());
043            int modZ = getBlockFaceModValue(dir.getZ());
044            for (BlockFace face : BlockFace.values()) {
045                if (face.getModY() == 0 && face.getModX() == modX && face.getModZ() == modZ) {
046                    return face;
047                }
048            }
049            return BlockFace.SELF;
050        } catch (IllegalArgumentException exc) {
051            return BlockFace.SELF;
052        }
053    }
054
055    private static int getRelativeModValue(double decimal) {
056        if (decimal < BLOCK_LIMIT_LEFT)  { return -1; }
057        if (decimal > BLOCK_LIMIT_RIGHT) { return  1; }
058        return 0;
059    }
060
061    private static boolean isRelativeBlockSolid(Block from, int modX, int modZ) {
062        Block block = from.getRelative(modX, 0, modZ);
063        return !block.isEmpty() && !block.isLiquid();
064    }
065
066    public static Vector getDeathBlockVector(Location loc) {
067        Block block = loc.getBlock().getRelative(0, -1, 0);
068        if (!block.isEmpty() && !block.isLiquid()) {
069            return new Vector(block.getX(), block.getY() + 1, block.getZ());
070        }
071
072        double x = Math.abs(loc.getX());
073        double z = Math.abs(loc.getZ());
074        double xDec = x - Math.floor(x);
075        double zDec = z - Math.floor(z);
076        int modX = getRelativeModValue(xDec);
077        int modZ = getRelativeModValue(zDec);
078
079        if (modX != 0 && isRelativeBlockSolid(block, modX, 0)) {
080            return new Vector(block.getX() + modX, block.getY() + 1, block.getZ());
081        }
082        if (modZ != 0 && isRelativeBlockSolid(block, 0, modZ)) {
083            return new Vector(block.getX(), block.getY() + 1, block.getZ() + modZ);
084        }
085        if (modX != 0 && modZ != 0 && isRelativeBlockSolid(block, modX, modZ)) {
086            return new Vector(block.getX() + modX, block.getY() + 1, block.getZ() + modZ);
087        }
088
089        return null;
090    }
091
092    private DACUtil() {
093    }
094}
